document_data.mainbody: '''Nehushta''' was a [[primordial]] [[artificer]] who fought against the [[god]]s during the [[Dawn War]].
document_data.Description: Nehushta was a massive being made of different metallic alloys who shined star-white when roused to fury. Over the years, she modified her own body with fantastic assemblages of gears, blades, and other [[golem]]-like improvements.
